gitpipe.git.Git¶

class gitpipe.git.Git(cwd='.')[source]¶

This class allows one to upload and retrieve files from a git repository

add(filename='', options='')[source]¶

Add files to the git repository

Parameters

  • filename (str) – Name of file to add (Default: ‘’)

  • options (str) – Additional options (Default: ‘’)

checkout(branch)[source]¶

Checkout a branch

Parameters

branch (str) – Branch to checkout

commit(message='')[source]¶

Commit files to the git repository

Parameters

message (str) – Commit message

get_branch()[source]¶

Return the name of the current branch

Returns

Name of current branch

Return type

str

merge(branch, options='')[source]¶

Merge branch to current

Parameters

  • branch (str) – Branch to merge

  • options (str) – (Optional) arguments (Default: ‘’)

push(remote='origin', branch='master', options=None)[source]¶

Push committed files in branch to remote

Parameters

  • remote (str) – Remote (Default: ‘origin’)

  • branch (str) – Branch (Default: ‘master’)

  • options (str) – (Optional) arguments (Default: ‘’)
